benchmark_details.name: L3Cube-IndicQuest: A Benchmark Question Answering Dataset for Evaluating Knowledge of LLMs in Indic Context
benchmark_details.overview: L3Cube-IndicQuest is a gold-standard factual question-answering benchmark dataset designed to evaluate how well multilingual LLMs capture regional knowledge across various Indic languages. The dataset contains 4000 question-answer pairs, each for English and 19 Indic languages, covering five domains specific to the Indic region.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for evaluating the performance of LLMs in understanding and representing knowledge relevant to the Indian context.

data.source: The dataset comprises factual question-and-answer pairs sourced from reputable platforms like Wikipedia and well-known educational websites.
data.annotation: Manual verification and translation processes were conducted to ensure accuracy.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on alignment between model-generated responses and ground truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: Scores are interpreted based on factual accuracy, relevance, clarity, language consistency, and conciseness.
methodology.validation: Evaluation covered various multilingual models including GPT-4o, Llama-3.1-405B-Instruct, Gemma-2-2B-it, and Gemma-2-9B-it.
